info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:54PM CDT until June 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR RANDOLPH...CENTRAL TALLADEGA AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 554 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ephesus to near Alpine Bay Resort, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Roanoke, Lineville, Ashland, Wedowee, Lake Wedowee, Wadley, Waldo, Woodland, Malone, Morrison Cross Roads, Barfield, Corinth, Fosters Cross Roads, Delta, Crystal Lake, Graham, Cleveland Crossroads, Dickert and Newell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
